name: Ahlijasa Indonesia Pte Ltd
description: Provider of an on-demand platform designed to offer laundry services. The company's platform simplifies the process of finding the right service professional for all personal and household needs, enabling consumers to hire household assistance through a mobile application.
one_liner: Provider of an on-demand platform designed to offer laundry services. The company's platform simplifies the process of finding the right service professional for all personal and household needs, enabling consumers to hire household assistance through a mobile application.
